title: Successful login with correct email, password, and tenant selection
description: Verify that a user can login successfully using valid email and password credentials, and tenant access permissions are enforced.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid email and password
Select tenant from tenant dropdown
Click login button
Verify user is redirected to the dashboard
Verify user has access only to resources within the selected tenant

title: Login failure with incorrect password
description: Verify that login fails and appropriate error message is shown when password is incorrect.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid email and incorrect password
Select tenant
Click login button
Verify login fails with error message indicating invalid credentials
Verify user remains on login page

title: Dashboard shows correct KPI values based on backend data
description: Ensure that KPI cards, charts, and activity feeds on dashboard reflect accurate and up-to-date information from backend.

steps.description: Login as authorized user with dashboard access
Verify revenue KPI matches backend revenue data
Verify pending work orders KPI matches backend data
Verify overdue items KPI matches backend data
Verify performance charts render correct data
Verify activity feed shows recent activities correctly

title: Create new work order and verify lifecycle transitions
description: Test creating a new work order and progressing it through statuses: Aberta → Em andamento → Concluída → Faturada.

steps.description: Login to work orders module
Create new work order with mandatory details
Verify work order is created with status 'Aberta'
Change status to 'Em andamento'
Verify status updated to 'Em andamento'
Add attachments and capture signature
Verify attachments and signature are saved correctly
Change status to 'Concluída'
Verify status updated to 'Concluída'
Change status to 'Faturada'
Verify status updated to 'Faturada' and invoice generation

title: Validate CPF and CNPJ fields during customer creation
description: Ensure that CPF and CNPJ validations are enforced correctly when adding or updating customers.

steps.description: Navigate to customer creation page
Enter invalid CPF (wrong format or checksum)
Submit customer form
Verify that validation error is shown for invalid CPF
Enter invalid CNPJ (wrong format or checksum)
Submit customer form
Verify that validation error is shown for invalid CNPJ
Enter valid CPF or CNPJ
Submit form
Verify customer is created successfully

title: Merge duplicate customers and validate data integrity
description: Test merging duplicate customer entries and ensure data is consolidated correctly without loss.

steps.description: Navigate to duplicate customer detection page
Select two or more duplicate customers to merge
Perform merge operation
Verify only one customer record exists after merge
Verify customer data from merged records is consolidated correctly
Verify no orphaned references from merged customers remain

title: Create, update, and track product price history
description: Verify product CRUD operations including category management and price history tracking on updates.

steps.description: Navigate to product creation page
Create new product with category and initial price
Verify product is created and appears in list
Update product price
Verify new price is updated and previous price is archived in price history
View price history
Verify all price changes are listed with correct timestamps

title: Manage financial accounts receivable with payment settlement
description: Test creating accounts receivable entries and settling payments properly reflecting balances and statuses.

steps.description: Navigate to accounts receivable module
Create new accounts receivable linked to work order
Verify accounts receivable appears with correct amount and status
Record payment settlement against accounts receivable
Verify accounts receivable status is updated to 'paid' or partially paid as applicable
Verify updated balance is reflected correctly in summary dashboard

title: Technician scheduling prevents overlapping assignments
description: Verify technician schedules do not allow conflicting time slots or overbooking, ensuring conflict detection works.

steps.description: Navigate to technician scheduling page
Assign technician to a time slot
Verify assignment is saved correctly
Attempt to assign same technician overlapping another time slot
Verify system prevents overlapping schedule or warns of conflict

title: Generate and validate PDF for invoice and work order documents
description: Verify PDF generation for invoices and work orders includes all required information and formatting is correct.

steps.description: Navigate to invoice or work order detail page
Initiate PDF generation
Verify PDF file is generated and downloadable
Open PDF and verify presence of all key data fields (customer info, items, prices, dates)
Verify signature images or attachments are included in PDF if applicable

title: Audit logs capture all critical user actions with filter and export
description: Test that all critical user actions are logged, and audit logs support filtering by user, action, entity, date range and export functionality.

steps.description: Perform various actions in system (create/update/delete entities)
Navigate to audit logs page
Use filters to query logs by user, action type, entity type, and date ranges
Verify audit log entries correspond to performed actions
Export audit log data to CSV
Verify CSV export contains all filtered audit log entries with proper formatting

title: Real-time notifications update and unread count correctness
description: Verify notifications are delivered in real-time, unread counts are accurate, and marking as read functions properly.

steps.description: Trigger events generating notifications
Verify notifications appear instantly in user interface
Verify unread notifications count is updated correctly
Mark one or more notifications as read
Verify unread count decrements accordingly and notifications reflect read status
Mark all notifications as read
Verify unread count resets to zero

title: Settings module persist tenant, branch, and user profile changes
description: Test updating configurations in settings including tenant management, branches, and user profiles, ensuring all changes persist and reflect correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to settings page
Modify tenant information and save
Verify tenant changes persist after page reload
Add or update branch details and save
Verify branch data is saved and accurately listed
Update user profile details including password change
Verify profile updates persist and password change is effective

title: Customer portal independent login and access to permitted features
description: Validate that customers can log in independently to the portal and access only their allowed resources like dashboard, work orders, quotes, and financials.

steps.description: Open customer portal login page
Login with portal user credentials
Verify login is successful
Verify dashboard shows customer's KPIs and summaries
Access work orders, quotes, and financial statements pages
Verify only customer-specific data is accessible and visible
Attempt unauthorized access to admin or other tenant resources
Verify access is denied or redirected

title: Report generation with filters and CSV export
description: Test generating various report types with multiple filters applied and exporting report data to CSV without errors.

steps.description: Navigate to reports page
Select report type (e.g., productivity, financial, commissions)
Apply multiple filters such as date range, user, status
Generate report
Verify report displays accurate and filtered data
Export report to CSV
Verify CSV file downloads and contains correct report data

title: Import data with field mapping, preview, execution, and rollback
description: Verify the data import flow from file upload, mapping fields, previewing data, executing import, viewing history, and rolling back if needed.

steps.description: Navigate to data import page
Upload a valid import file
Map import file fields to system fields
Preview import data and fix mapping errors
Execute data import
Verify data is imported correctly into system
Check import history and audit details
Perform rollback of last import
Verify data created by import is removed and rollback is successful

title: Create service calls with technician assignment and calendar integration
description: Test creation of service calls with proper status management, technician assignment, calendar integration, and conversion to work order.

steps.description: Navigate to service calls module
Create new service call with all required details
Assign technician(s) to service call
Verify service call status created and technician assignment saved
Verify assigned technician's agenda or calendar reflects the new service call
Convert service call to work order
Verify new work order is created and linked to service call

title: Equipment management CRUD and calibration scheduling with alerts
description: Test equipment creation, updates, maintenance records, calibration scheduling with alerts dashboard, and calibration certificate PDF generation.

steps.description: Create new equipment record with required details
Verify equipment is created and listed
Add calibration and maintenance entries for equipment
Verify calibration calendar shows upcoming due dates
Open alerts dashboard
Verify alerts for equipment calibrations and maintenances are visible and accurate
Generate calibration certificate PDF
Verify PDF contains correct calibration details and is downloadable

title: Stock movements and low stock alert functioning
description: Verify stock CRUD operations including movements, and confirm low stock alerts on dashboard appear as expected.

steps.description: Create new stock movement increasing stock for a product
Verify stock level increases accordingly
Create stock movement decreasing stock below alert threshold
Verify stock level decreases and low stock alert appears on dashboard
View stock movement details
Verify stock movement is accurate with correct timestamps and quantities

title: Commissions lifecycle: create rules, track events, settlement, disputes, and export
description: Test commission management including rule creation, event tracking, settlements (close/pay/reopen), dispute handling, reports, PDF statement and CSV export.

steps.description: Create a new commission rule
Verify commission rule is saved and listed
Trigger commission events associated with transactions
Verify commission events are logged and visible
Perform settlement actions: close, pay, and reopen commissions
Verify settlement statuses update correctly
Create commission dispute and resolve it
Verify disputes are logged, status updated upon resolution
Generate commission PDF statement and export CSV
Verify files are generated and contain correct commission data
